title: "Hypnosis and attraction: exploring the mind and beauty standards"
first_phrase: In the previous section, we learned about how hypnosis can be used to access a different state of consciousness and unlock the mind. Now, we turn our attention to the subject of attraction and emotions. Is physical beauty the only factor that influences attraction, or is there more to it than meets the eye? In this section, we explore the concept of beauty and how it is shaped by social standards. We challenge you to expand your mind and rediscover what truly drives attraction.
content: Atracción y emociones ¿Con base en que criterios nos sentimos más atraídos por una persona que por otra? ¿Es solo la belleza o es una serie de factores que intervienen en la creación de lo que nosotros llamamos atracción? ¿Y como podemos definir la belleza física? Este capítulo le permite abrirse a la posibilidad de explayar su mente más allá de los de los condicionamientos, y descubrir de nuevo la atracción primaria. En efecto, muchos cánones cambian a lo largo del tiempo, y son un producto exclusivamente social. En la edad media, un ligero sobrepeso era considerado estéticamente deseable, porque en aquella época era visto como un signo de opulencia que no todos podían exhibir.
last_phrase: In conclusion, attraction and beauty are subjective concepts that vary over time and are heavily influenced by social norms. While physical appearance may play a role in attraction, it is not the only factor at play. By understanding the social constructs that shape our perceptions of beauty, we can broaden our minds and rediscover the primary attraction that goes beyond superficial standards. Let's embrace diversity and focus on what really matters: genuine connections and shared values.
